name: @elizaos/example-browser-extension-chrome
description: Chat with any webpage using AI - Chrome Extension powered by ElizaOS

scripts.package: bun run build && cd .. && zip -r chrome/chrome-extension.zip chrome -x 'chrome/node_modules/*' -x 'chrome/src/*' -x 'chrome/*.ts' -x 'chrome/tsconfig.json' -x 'chrome/tsup.config.ts'
